copy.plantingMessage: Are you sure you want to plant these #ITEM#?
copy.removeMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this plant? You will not be able to get it back.
copy.outOfDustMessage:
1. Open your Pouch to the Sweets tab.
2. Eat Cookies and other Sweets to refill your Pixie Dust!
copy.dustWaitingMessage: You can dust this plant again in
copy.moreDiamondsMessage: You need #AMOUNT# more Pixie #DIAMOND# to Insta-Bloom this plant.
copy.rewardBonusMessage: Your friends helped you grow a Super Surprise Item!
